value.title: Value
value.description: Integer value representing the number of milliseconds since 1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC (Unix Epoch).

nodes.description: Creates a JavaScript Date instance that represents a single moment in time. Date objects are based on a time value that is the number of milliseconds since 1 January, 1970 UTC.
nodes.title: Create Date
nodes.name: create

value.title: Value
value.description: The string should be in a format recognized by the Date.parse() method (IETF-compliant RFC 2822 timestamps and also a version of ISO8601).

out.title: Month
out.description: The day of the month (1-31) for the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The day of the month (1-31) for the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Date
nodes.name: getDate

out.title: Day
out.description: The day of the week (0-6) for the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The day of the week (0-6) for the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Day
nodes.name: getDay

out.title: Year
out.description: The year (4 digits for 4-digit years) of the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The year (4 digits for 4-digit years) of the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Full Year
nodes.name: getFullYear

out.title: Hour
out.description: The hour (0-23) in the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The hour (0-23) in the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Hours
nodes.name: getHours

out.title: Milliseconds
out.description: The milliseconds (0-999) in the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The milliseconds (0-999) in the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Getting Milliseconds
nodes.name: getMilliseconds

out.title: Minutes
out.description: The minutes (0-59) in the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The minutes (0-59) in the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Minutes
nodes.name: getMinutes

out.title: Month
out.description: The month (0-11) in the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The month (0-11) in the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Month
nodes.name: getMonth

out.title: Seconds
out.description: The seconds (0-59) in the specified date according to local time.

nodes.description: The seconds (0-59) in the specified date according to local time.
nodes.title: Get Seconds
nodes.name: getSeconds

out.title: Time
out.description: The numeric value of the specified date as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (negative for prior times).

nodes.description: The numeric value of the specified date as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC (negative for prior times).
nodes.title: Get Time
